text: Effortlessly manage your's and your loved one's medications with myDiya.
Track any medication from myDiya's library of over 100,000 brands and ingredient combinations. Simply add new medications by manually searching or taking a picture of your prescription.
Receive alerts if your medications negatively interfere with each other or with any allergies you may have.
Print a copy of your medication report or share it with your care team to maintain safe, accurate treatment.
To learn more about myDiya's medication safety capabilities, watch the following video.
